Package view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BattlePanel
    Class that represent the board of the Battleship game, and shows all the moves taken both by the Player and the Computer.
    BattleshipView
    Class that represents the JFrame where all panels with their content are shown.
    CountdownPanel
    Class that represents the timer for a timed Battleship match.
    ExitFrame
    Utility JFrame created whenever the user clicks on the BattleshipView's exit button.
    NewGamePanel
    This class extends a JPanel that is shown according to the BattleshipModel's state by the BattleshipView.
    SetShipsPanel
    Class that represents the phase of setting ships onto the Battleship grid.
    StartLoadPanel
    This class extends a JPanel that is shown according to the BattleshipModel's state by the BattleshipView.
    WindowDestructor
    Class that extends a WindowAdapter and creates an ExitFrame when the BattleshipView's exit button is pressed.
